titleStmt.title: Syr P.S. His Astrophel and Stella Wherein the excellence of sweete poesie is concluded. To the end of which are added, sundry other rare sonnets of diuers noble men and gentlemen.
Astrophel and Stella
titleStmt.author: Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586.

notesStmt.note: With an epistle by Thomas Newman, a preface by Thomas Nash and sonnets by Samuel Daniel, etc.--STC.
